name: Rosenheim
description: We offer a large open apartment for self-catering (bread service available) with large balcony, nice landlord, large garden - ideal for families. The apartment is spread over 3 floors and includes a large lounge with a fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, sat TV, comfortable seating area, sofa. On this floor there is also a small bathroom with shower and toilet and 1 double room with balcony towards the garden. On the second Floor there are 2 doubles, 1 triple, 1 single (extra bed available) and a separate toilet. Another large bathroom with shower and bathtub is on the 1st floor. All multi-bed rooms on the second Floor are connected by a continous balcony. Garden furniture and sun loungers are at your disposal. Each room has a sink, bed linen and towels are included in the offer once. Cots and highchairs can be provided free of charge.
Large holiday flat for max. 11 persons without meals, bread-roll service, hand- and bath towels incl., WIFI incl., bed linen incl.,

Check in: 3:00 pm
Check out: 9:00 am

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 4 or more bed rooms
makesOffer.description: Large holiday flat with 3 double rooms, 1 single room (with the possibilty of a second bed), 1 triple room, 1 bath room with shower and WC, 2 separate WC's, 1 bath room with bath tube and shower, large balcony, large garden....large full equiped kitchen with couch and SAT-TV.  Bed linen, hand and bath towels are included. We also have a large ski room and a heating room to drying the skiboots and clothes. Bus stop to the cable cars to the mountains of Mayrhofen are directly in front of the house
